ability.name: Nightmare Aura
ability.text: Whenever you attach a [D] Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Chaotic Impact
attacks.effect_text: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

ability.name: Broken-Space Bellow
ability.text: Once during your turn, you may take a [P] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

name: Poké Ball
effect_text: Put 1 random Basic Pokemon from your deck into your hand.

name: Red
effect_text: During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex.

name: Giant Cape
effect_text: The Pokémon this card is attached to gets +20 HP.

name: Rocky Helmet
effect_text: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Sabrina
effect_text: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

name: Cyrus
effect_text: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has damage on it to the Active Spot.

name: Mars
effect_text: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws a card for each of their remaining points needed to win.

name: Potion
effect_text: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

name: Pokémon Center Lady
effect_text: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon, and it recovers from all Special Conditions.

name: Leaf
effect_text: During this turn, the Retreat Cost of your Active Pokémon is 2 less.

name: Dawn
effect_text: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

name: Team Rocket Grunt
effect_text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Iono
effect_text: Each player shuffles the cards in their hand into their deck, then draws that many cards.
